CUTOFF=20
log +oid.log;
taxname=;
taxname +85;
report +200
nstates DNA;
mxram 2000;
p &FAMILY.aligned.revfasta;
watch=;
echo=;
riddup;
xi;
mult = tbr replic 20 hol10;
riddup-;
taxname ];
riddup;
xi;
nel*;
riddup-;
tchoose/;
tsave oids.tre;
save /;
tsave /;
export - oid.tre;
log /
system >.tre.done
zzz;
proc;
CUTOFF=150
log +oid.log;
taxname=;
taxname +85;
report +200
nstates DNA;
mxram 2000;
sect:slack 50 xbuf recurse 5 xss fuse 5 starts 5;
rat:iter100up4do4;
p &FAMILY.aligned.revfasta;
watch=;
echo=;
rs0;
rs *;
col3;
hold 100;
xmult:rep 5  drift 12 fuse 6  level 6 chklevel +1 1;
xmult: rat 5 hol1;
sect:;
xmult:;
riddup;
xi;
xmult = rep5 hol2;
tf;
riddup-;
sort;
score;
taxname ];
riddup;
xi;
nel*;
riddup-;
tchoose/;
tsave oids.tre;
save /;
tsave /;
export - oid.tre;
log /;
system >.tre.done
zzz;
proc;
CUTOFF=300
log +oid.log;
taxname=;
taxname +85;
report +200
nstates DNA;
mxram 2000;
sect:slack 50 xbuf recurse 5 xss fuse 5 starts 5;
rat:iter100up4do4;
p &FAMILY.aligned.revfasta;
watch=;
echo=;
rs0;
rs *;
col3;
hold 100;
xmult:rep 5  drift 12 fuse 6  level 6 chklevel +1 1;
xmult: rat 5 hol1;
sect:;
xmult:;
riddup;
xi;
xmult = rep5 hol2;
riddup-;
riddup;
xi;
tf;
riddup-;
sort;
score;
taxname ];
riddup;
xi;
nel*;
riddup-;
tchoose/;
tsave oids.tre;
save /;
tsave /;
export - oid.tre;
log /;
system >.tre.done
zzz;
proc;
